Product title: River Dream Heavyweight No Hooks Required Dotted Waffle Weave Shower Curtain with Snap in Liner，Bathroom Curtains Shower Set - 71W x 74H,Hotel Grade,Spa Like Bath Curtain,White
Key Features: 100%polyester | Size Notice: The usable size is the same as a regular 71x72 shower curtain,snap in liner is 70" x 54" (WxL) | This bathroom curtains shower set designed with "Split Rings" that let you hang them easily. No need to buy hooks and no need to remove the rod | A clear window along the top lets light in and allows you to see out while maintaining privacy | Hotel Quality: The shower curtain and liner are made with high quality Fabric, heavy weight to keep it in place. Water repellent treatment can repel the water inside tub
comment 1: I looks great; the open top doesn’t shrink the space and the no hooks required made it so easy to install. - P. J.
comment 2: Easy to install. Great quality and look. Having the liner with the curtain is so easy to use. - Michele
comment 3: Love this shower curtain.  The sheer panel at the top allows light to come into the shower.  It is a very elegant-looking shower curtain.  Love that there are no shower hooks required.  A much cleaner look. - Blossom
comment 4: Good quality curtain. I ended up buying two because I wanted to try out the two different colors. They both had good consistent quality. The big challenge may be finding the color that matches your space. I first tried the linen color. I found a bit too dark for a non-window bathroom then I tried the cream color which ended up being very bland for the space so I stuck with the linen. The color, size, length, weight, and thickness all matched expectations. The price was good at Black Friday values, otherwise, I might have been tempted to keep searching for the perfect color for my space. - Zee
comment 5: Nice quality  A little challenging to hang. Had to pull hard to separate ring openings on a couple of the rings to loop the curtain rings properly.  Looks nice. - kathleen nolan
